DOC.criteria: BMI > 25 , regular menstruation , volunteer symptomatic obesity , acupuncture treatment within 3 month , > 120kg , pregnancy breastfeeding , hemophilia , dementia , mental illness , arrhythmia , liver cirrhosis , renal failure , pace maker , diabete mellitus , tuberculosis , steroid taker ,
